name: Virtual Doc (Your Personal Health Center)
note: The ultimate platform where doctors and patients meet virtually. The user can find a specific doctor among all the doctors on the platform according to their problems
features: In order for the user to be able to make an appointment with the doctor, he must first fix the problem.
Then the doctor will fix it and pay and then the the doctor will give a video call and link.
Users can make an appointment with the doctor and go live with the doctor to know about their problem.
Then the doctor will see his problem and give medicine.
You can download and paint the prescription given by the doctor. And you can see how much money you are using by going to your profile.

name: Meal Management System
note: This is a e-commers website. Here user can see login registration and food items. And can order it by logging in. The admin panel will be able to administer their receive surve and users
features: Admin root and user root come separately. Now customers can pay through card.
Meals Add Update Delete and Meals Request can be given here.
Member user can see their payment list with a search filter
Users can purchase memberships. You can give reviews and watch.
This i a website a payment method so member-user can pay their rent from home

name: Job Search
note: After login, the user can apply for the job, if the date is over, he will not be able to apply. Users can see examples in their resumes.
features: If you want to know the details of the job here and if you want to apply, you have to login or register here. Without login or registration you cannot apply any job or view details here.

Here you can see your applied jobs in Applied Jobs. And if you want to post any job then you can go to add job and post the job. And within My Jobs, who can update and delete and view jobs from there.

We have many types of jobs here like remote jobs, part time jobs and full time jobs. If you want to see remote then you can see remote by clicking on remote, if you click on part time you can see part time and if you click on full time you can see full time job.
If you go to All Jobs route, you can see all the detailed jobs there. There are part time full time and remote jobs. And if you block, you can know details about our project.
This is my job search project. Various types of jobs can be posted and applied from here. If you apply for a job here, a PDF file will be saved on your computer.

name: Music Art

features: You can know about our music courses through this website.
You can see our courses and details.
You can contact us on the contact page.

name: Technology Electronices
note: My project is technology and now I have a mobile laptop watch. If I want to take this service, I have to register/login, otherwise I will not be able to take full service.
features: You can add products to my project and view the products. And you can see that product UI. There you can see Delete Edit and View Details.
If you want to see our services at technology and electronics then you have to register now. Otherwise you will not be able to see our services.
If you register us here, you can see your email and photo on Navbar. You can see all our projects if you register.
If you get our 24/7 service. And you can contact us and you will get all our contact numbers, email, Facebook pages and YouTube links. We provide our customers with respect and service.
